LocaleResource.Name: DescriptionText.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enter info that will be shown to customers during checkout.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.AliPayment.AdditionalFeePercentage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines whether to apply a percentage additional fee to the order total. If not enabled, a fixed value is used.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.AliPayment.InvalidCredentials
LocaleResource.Value: Incomplete credentials for the PayPal API. Please enter the required data in the configuration area.
